banner.hi: Hi! Thanks for dropping by. Make yourself at home, and I'll share a bit about who I am and the journey that brought me here.

about.about-subtitle: I'm Frontend Developer & Full Stack Student from Argentina
about.about-me: Passionate about programming, creating, and imagining, with a dedicated two-year study in the field. Quick learner and proactive team player.
about.exp-two: 2023-to date: Translation of courses and books for English teachers into Spanish.
about.exp-three: 2023-to date: Managing a local store specializing in fresh and food products.
